title: 35: Responses to Labor Saving Technical Changes
dc:creator: mad hat pod
description: We are joined by Professor Ravi Kanbur to talk about how technology has displaced jobs historically and is actively.  We also talk about ways to account for this in our era with skilled workers, tax and transfer, and policy interventions.  Hosted by Yudong Rao, Elaine Qiu, and Professor David Just.
